about_the_game:
Embark on a roguelike shooting game set in a mysterious world that combines 2D and 3D elements. Survive and escape from an unknown planet. Utilize enemy resources to enhance yourself, repair your damaged spaceship, and prepare for increasingly powerful and numerous enemy forces.

Key Features
-Unique art combining 2D and 3D elements
-Intriguing world and storyline
-Simple and easy controls
-Hordes of massive and numerous enemies to fend off
-Satisfying sensation of defeating adversaries
-Diverse weapon types, upgrades, and builds
-Enjoyable gameplay with permanent growth elements
-Adorable and cool cat characters

name: Starfall Invaders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a roguelike shooting game set in a mysterious world that combines 2D and 3D elements. Survive and escape from an unknown planet. Utilize enemy resources to enhance yourself, repair your damaged spaceship, and prepare for increasingly powerful and numerous enemy forces.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
